name: Tales of Finn MacCool
description:
Tales of Finn MacCool tells the story of an old jovial wizard who lives deep in the woodland. He encountered a young dryad (140 years old) one day and managed to break her curse. They decide to take a vacation together. Finn MacCool is a trippy light-hearted adventure based in the same world as "Rat King's Quest," a novel I'm working on right now.

This is a work of fiction. Any names or characters, businesses or places, events or incidents, are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental. The materials found in the game are not safe for minors or children under 18 years old. And contain violence some violence and drug reference. The female protagonists are all over 18 years old.
